resources.string: Let us know what features\nyou\'d like to see!\nWe\'ll do our best to add them!

What The Banana is an app we created freely to make what we wanted.
 
Currently, it features a Pixel Art Maker, Roulette, and Puzzle!
 
In the future, we can add features youâ€™d like, so feel free to share your suggestions anytime through the "Your Ideas" feature in the app!
